name: AR.IO Gateway Plugin
description: Tools for interacting with AR.IO gateways and Arweave, including SSH-based gateway management

gatewayUrl.description: URL of the AR.IO gateway API. Defaults to https://arweave.net

ssh.description: SSH configuration for gateway management operations

keyPath.description: Path to SSH private key file (e.g., /home/node/.ssh/gateway_key)

workingDirectory.description: Path to ar-io-node directory on gateway server. Defaults to ~/ar-io-gateway
